text: Bizen may refer to: * Bizen, Okayama, a city located in the ChÅ«goku region of western Honshu, the largest island of Japan. * Bizen Province, an old province of Japan on the Inland Sea side of Honshu * Bizen ware, a type of Japanese pottery * Debre Bizen, a monastery of the Eritrean Orthodox Tewahdo Church
title: Bizen
